body.ab: never <lb n="c56-0020__main__23"/> beheld her so enchanting as at this <lb n="c56-0020__main__24"/> time when she sar sacrifised every <lb n="c56-0020__main__25"/> minut<del rend="unmarked" sID="c56-0020__main__d2e3968"/>e<del eID="c56-0020__main__d2e3968"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0020__main__d2e3971"/>of her time<del eID="c56-0020__main__d2e3971"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0020__main__d2e3974"/>to others<del eID="c56-0020__main__d2e3974"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>wascontinual<lb n="c56-0020__main__26"/>ly endeavouring to contribute to the <lb n="c56-0020__main__27"/> happiness of others entirely forgetful<lb n="c56-0021__main__1"/> of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0021__main__d2e4010"/>hels<del eID="c56-0021__main__d2e4010"/> herself.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0021__main__2"/> The day of my departure at lenghth <lb n="c56-0021__main__3"/> arrived â€“
